new_posts.title: New features and improvements in GitHub Copilot in JetBrains IDEs
new_posts.summary: This update brings several improvements to GitHub Copilot in JetBrains IDEs. These include support for Agent Skills in preview, several user experience improvements across inline chat and settings,

new_posts.title: Updated GitHub status page experience
new_posts.summary: We’ve updated the GitHub status page to make incident information easier to find and more useful during an active event. The status site now includes a 90-day historical view of availab

new_posts.title: New repository settings for configuring pull request access
new_posts.summary: Maintainers now have more control over how repositories accept contributions. Two new settings let you manage pull requests to better match your project’s needs. Disable pull requests entirel

new_posts.title: Network configuration changes for Copilot coding agent
new_posts.summary: Copilot coding agent is our asynchronous, autonomous background agent. Delegate a task to Copilot, and Copilot works in the background in its own development environment, powered by GitHub Actions.

new_posts.title: GitHub Agentic Workflows are now in technical preview
new_posts.summary: GitHub Agentic Workflows let you automate repository tasks using AI agents that run within GitHub Actions. Write workflows in plain Markdown instead of complex YAML, and let AI handle intelligent&#

new_posts.title: Automate repository tasks with GitHub Agentic Workflows
new_posts.summary:
Discover GitHub Agentic Workflows, now in technical preview. Build automations using coding agents in GitHub Actions to handle triage, documentation, code quality, and more.

The post

new_videos.title: Open Source Friday with Caracal - a runtime execution authority layer for AI agents in production
Introducing GitHub Agentic Workflows | intent-driven repository automation
